item.title: Integrative approach using liver and duodenum RNA-Seq data identifies candidate genes and pathways associated with feed efficiency in pigs
item.description:
Full citation

Ramayo-Caldas, Y., Ballester, M., Sánchez, J.P., González-Rodríguez, O., Revilla, M., Reyer, H., Wimmers, K., Torrallardona, D., Quintanilla, R. (2018). Integrative approach using liver and duodenum RNA-Seq data identifies candidate genes and pathways associated with feed efficiency in pigs. Scientific Reports, 8(1):558. doi: 10.1038/s41598-017-19072-5
